junior_high_school_en.英語はたくさんの国で話されています: English is spoken in many countries
junior_high_school_en.私は図書館で彼に会いました: I saw him at the library

high_school_en.私は教師であり作家でもある: I am a teacher and writer
high_school_en.私が彼を信頼している、というのは彼は私の親友だからだ: I trust him for he is my true friend
high_school_en.雨が止んだら外に出かけよう: We will go put when the rain stops
high_school_en.助けが必要なら、私に電話してください: If you need any help,please give me a call
high_school_en.この本は面白いし役に立つ: This book is both interesting and useful
high_school_en.ここだけの話、この方針は良くない: Between you and me, this policy is not good
high_school_en.私は中国出身ではなくて、日本出身だ(butを使った相関接続詞): I am not from China , but from japan
high_school_en.私は中国出身ではなくて、日本出身だ(butの省略): I am from japan,not from China
high_school_en.私の妻だけではなく娘も笑っていた(Not only ~ but also: Not only my wife but also my daughter was laughing
high_school_en.私の妻だけではなく娘も笑っていた(as well as): My daughter as well as my wife was laughing
high_school_en.あなたか私のどちらかが彼女の面倒を見なければならない: Either you or I have to take vare of her
high_school_en.彼も彼の妻もまだ到着していない: Neither he not his wige has arrived
high_school_en.早く起きなさい、そうすれば学校に間に合うだろう: Get up early,and you'll be on time for school
high_school_en.早く起きなさい、さもなければパーティに送れるだろう: Get up early,or you'll be late for the party
high_school_en.私たちはいま出発しなければならない、さもなければ電車に乗り遅れるだろう: We must leave now,or we'll miss the train
high_school_en.私たちは植物学、すなわち植物の研究に興味がある: I am interested in botany,or the study of plants
